name: hyperphysical
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not limited or ruled by physical limits or laws: He suggested that the human mind exists on some sort of hyperphysical level. The mind has the capacity of knowing hyper-physical as well as physical objects.
More examplesFewer examplesIt may be that in these images divine sanction is illustrated by hyperphysical ability.Kant clearly rejects the idea of hyperphysical properties.I firmly believe that Kant does not put a hyperphysical value at the foundation of his morality.
